error_fetching_data: There was an error fetching data for this request.
not_running_compatible_software: That server is not running software compatible with this mobile app.
server_didnt_understand_request: The server didn't understand the request sent from this device.
problem_connecting_try_again: There was a problem connecting, please try again later.
unexpected_error_try_again: There was an unexpected error, please try again later.
we_translated_this: We translated this to your language!
we_used_google_translate: If you see any wording that is odd, please let us know so we can fix it.
know_who_represents_you: Know who represents you! (or doesn't) Give 'em a piece of your mind.
our_zero_cost_tool: Our zero cost tool enables you to hit the pavement with the latest tech.
canvassing_at_scale: Canvassing at scale; import data, create turf, better volunteer management.
we_operate_on_donations: We operate on donations. Keep this app free by making a contribution today.
feedback_helps_us: Feedback helps us make this app better. Share your experience with the world.
help_us_out_directly: You can help us out directly! Contribute art, how-to's, or write code. The power is yours.
this_program_is_free_software: This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
note_about_apple_eula: NOTE: Distribution on the iOS App Store means this specific copy of the app falls under the Apple Inc. Standard EULA.
tap_here_for_source_code: Tap here for the source code
homescreen_summary: Our Voice USA is a 501(c)(3) non-profit charity. Not for any candidate or political party. We provide access to tools that enables every day people to be politically engaged. Check us out on social media!
this_app_is_made_possible_by: This app is made possible by everday people who have become patrons of HelloVoter. Your name could be included here too!
no_guarantee_district: Unfortunately we can't guarantee accurate district results without a whole address.
howto_use_current_location: To use your current location, go into your phone settings and enable location access for HelloVoter.
device_settings_deny_location: Your device settings deny this app access to your location, please enable location access for this app in your device settings to continue.
location_services_unavailable: Location Services is unavailable, please turn on Location Seervices in your device settings and restart this app to continue.
not_located_within_us_bounds: You are not located within the United States of America. Unable to continue.
must_enter_valid_qr_code: You must enter a valid QR Code or Organization ID to continue.
not_a_vlid_qr_code: Sorry, that is not a valid QR Code or Organization ID.
request_to_canvas_rejected: We're sorry, but your request to canvas with this server has been rejected.
confirm_delete_form: Are you sure you wish to delete this form? All related canvassing data will be lost.
error_delete_form: There was an error deleting the form
no_canvas_forms_ask_someone: No Canvassing forms. Ask someone who created one to share their form with you, or create a new one.
we_need_permission_use_camera: We need your permission to use your camera
sure_you_wish_logout: Are you sure you wish to logout?
need_help_using_tool: Need help using this tool? Check out our
with_useful_articles: with useful articles and video demos.
using_tool_you_acknowledge: By using this tool you acknowledge that you are acting on your own behalf, do not represent Our Voice USA or its affiliates, and have read our
be_courteous_to_those: Please be courteous to those you meet.
join_existing_effort: Join an existing effort to knock doors and encourge our neighbors to get out and vote.
didnt_receive_qr_code: Didn't receive a QR Code? Enter the Organization ID for your canvassing operation to join.
no_qr_code_please_ask: If you donâ€™t have a QR Code or Organization ID yet, please ask your organization to provide you with one.
